text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text:
Together we'll run for our dream! ♪<n>We'll keep trying, and
wring out all<n>our strength! ♪

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Wow, that was amazing! Both therace and the concert! My heart'sstill pounding!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: I know, I know! And the best part of<n>all was...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Teio! McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Did you see Teio's final sprint? Her<n>power is incredible!
She's second to<n>none!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
But McQueen had perfect pacing! She<n>stays calm and
composed all the way<n>to the finish line. No one else can<n>
compare!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Teio!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Well, did you see the way Teio's cute<n>ponytail flutters in the
wind as she<n>runs?!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, I was too busy staring at<n>McQueen's beautiful locks
gleaming<n>in the sunlight!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Grr...

text_block_list.name: Passerby
text_block_list.text: Hehe, look at those girls playing<n>together. How adorable.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Ahem. Anyway, let's just agree that<n>they were both
incredible...

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. Yes! Both of them were really<n>cool! How could they
not be?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Um... Aaand Tokai Teio makes her<n>move! She puts on a
burst of speed to<n>chase down Mejiro McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Hehe. Is that an impression of the<n>caster?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Yep! It's a little off though, don't you<n>think? Doesn't quite
do Teio justice.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
But we've only just joined the<n>academy. There's so much
to learn!<n>I'm gonna become just like Teio and<n>my dad!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Your father... Oh, of course—he's a<n>kind man who everyone
in town loves,<n>isn't he?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, thanks for saying that. Yeah, I<n>really admire my dad.
He always puts<n>other people's happiness first!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Wherever he goes, he's always<n>surrounded by smiles.
That's why I<n>wanna do the same and make people<n>smile
with my running!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Just like Teio does too! I'm sure it'll<n>make my mom happy
as well!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Though my reason's not exactly<n>super deep like yours, Dia!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I mean, you joined Tracen Academy<n>to fulfill your family's
wish, didn't<n>you?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Hmm, not quite. My family'swish—for me to win G1 races—isactually my dream too.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
I was born thanks to the hopes and<n>dreams of many
people—my mother,<n>my father, and everyone connected to<n>
our business.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
I want to meet their expectations and<n>show everyone my
own unique style<n>of running... just like McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I see! Well, I know you'll be ableto make your dream come true!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
You too, Kita! You'll make everyone<n>smile—I'm sure of it!
That's one of<n>your strengths, after all!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Hehe. ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Ding-dong, bing-bong...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Wait, that chime... Oh no! It's almost<n>curfew! We have to
hurry back to the<n>dorm!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
No need to panic. I'll just call my<n>driver... Oh, I don't have
my cell phone.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Then let's take a taxi... Um, you don't<n>happen to have my
wallet, do you,<n>Kita?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Nope, and I don't have any money on<n>me either! We'll just
have to make a<n>run for it! C'mooon!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume's Journal
text_block_list.text: "I messed up again today. Why doesthis always happen to me?Sigh..."

text_block_list.name: Umamusume's Journal
text_block_list.text: "But it's okay! I'll have anotherchance with my next race. I'll pushmyself harder and definitely winthe next one!"

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The next day...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Phew, we're finally done. This placeis way too huge for just twopeople to clean.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha... Well, it was the dorm<n>leader's decision, so what
could we<n>do?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
"Quite brazen of you to break dorm<n>curfew so soon after
entering the<n>academy. As a tribute to your<n>bravery, I'll
reward you both with a<n>week's worth of cleaning duty."

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, is that your impression of the<n>dorm leader yesterday?
You're really<n>good at impersonations, Kita!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe. I was so bummed out that it<n>stuck in my head. But
whatever!<n>Cleaning duty just feels like another<n>part of
school life!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Plus, you're here with me, Dia!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Huh? What about it?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Anything's fun when you're with<n>your best friend! I can't
wait for us to<n>go running together too!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah. I feel the same way. But—
WAAAAAH!
